question: At time of separation from my love, I have assured her that I will name my daughter after your name, if born after my nikah just to remember her love. Is it ok to do so?
answer:
QUESTION
At time of separation from my love. I have assured her that i will name my daughter after your name ,if born after my nikah ,just to remember her love.Is it ok to do so?
ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.

Can you please clarify what is meant by ‘my love’?  Are you separating from somebody and marrying somebody else?  Please elaborate and phrase the question clearly.


And Allah Ta’āla Knows Best

Mawlana Faraz Ibn Adam,
Student Darul Iftaa
